00044 
00045     //! this is called when connected driver emit a signal
00046     //! unless dependency is broken
00047     //! all connected drivers are readLocked

00049     //! this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw()
00050     //! record is readLocked

00052     //! check connected drivers have valid time
00053     //! \return true if dependency is resolved
00054     virtual bool checkDependency(const shared_ptr<XDriver> &emitter) const;
00055

00057     //! driver specific part below 
00058

00061     //! Entry storing the freq. of the strongest peak.
00062     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> &entryPeakFreq() const {return m_entryPeakFreq;}

00073 
00074     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &phaseAdv() const {return m_phaseAdv;}   ///< [deg]
00075     /// Periodic-Noise Reduction
00076     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &usePNR() const {return m_usePNR;}
00077     /// Select spectrum solver.
00078     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &pnrSolverList() const {return m_pnrSolverList;}
00079     /// Select spectrum solver. FFT/AR/MEM.
00080     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &solverList() const {return m_solverList;}
00081     /// Position from trigger, for background subtraction or PNR [ms]

00083     /// length for background subtraction or PNR [ms]  
00084     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &bgWidth() const {return m_bgWidth;}
00085     /// Phase 0 deg. position of FT component from trigger [ms]
00086     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &fftPos() const {return m_fftPos;}
00087     /// If exceeding Width, do zerofilling
00088     const shared_ptr<XUIntNode> &fftLen() const {return m_fftLen;}
00089     /// FFT/AR Window Function
00090     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &windowFunc() const {return m_windowFunc;}
00091     /// FFT/AR/MEM Window Length / Taps
00092     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &windowWidth() const {return m_windowWidth;}
00093     /// Set Digital IF frequency
00094     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &difFreq() const {return m_difFreq;}
00095 
00096     /// Extra Average with infinite steps
00097     const shared_ptr<XBoolNode> &exAvgIncr() const {return m_exAvgIncr;}
00098     /// Extra Average Steps
00099     const shared_ptr<XUIntNode> &extraAvg() const {return m_extraAvg;}
00100     /// Clear averaging results
00101     const shared_ptr<XNode> &avgClear() const {return m_avgClear;}
00102 
00103     /// # of echoes
00104     const shared_ptr<XUIntNode> &numEcho() const {return m_numEcho;}
00105     /// If NumEcho > 1, need periodic term of echoes [ms]
00106     const shared_ptr<XDoubleNode> &echoPeriod() const {return m_echoPeriod;}

00108     //! records below.
00109 
00110     //! Time-domain Wave.

00112     //! Power spectrum of the noise estimated from the background. [V^2/Hz].
00113     const std::vector<double> &darkPSD() const {return m_darkPSD;}
00114     //! freq. resolution [Hz]
00115     double dFreq() const {return m_dFreq;}

00117     double interval() const {return m_interval;}

00122     //! Position of the origin of FT.

00124     //! Length of FT.
00125     int ftWidth() const {return m_ftWave.size();}
